posts.post_title: FS:  T206 Joe Tinker (bat off) PSA 4.5
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Adam
I am still in the process of stockpiling money for REA, so I am now offering the following for sale as well:
 
T206 Tinker, Bat off Shoulder, Sweet Caporal (overprint), PSA 4.5 - $220
T206 Dahlen, Brooklyn, Sovereign, PSA 4 - **SOLD**
T206 Brown, Cubs on Shirt, Piedmont, PSA 4 - **SOLD**

All prices include delivery.  Please email me at aamoniz@yahoo.com if you would like any.  Paypal fine with no additional surcharge.  Front and back scans are below.

Regards,
Adam
